properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 3:58PM CST until February 20 at 12:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* from Wednesday February 19 until Wednesday February 19.
* At 03 PM Tuesday the stage was...16.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 20.6 feet on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday February 19 and
continue to rise to near 20.6 feet by Wednesday February 19. The
river will fall below flood stage by Wednesday February 19.
* At 20.0 feet...Lowland flooding begins.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
